results.title: The Goonies
results.plot: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.
results.stars: Richard Donner, Sean Astin, Josh Brolin, Jeff Cohen, Corey Feldman

results.title: Back to the Future
results.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
results.stars: Robert Zemeckis, Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover

results.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
results.plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, John Rhys-Davies

results.title: The Princess Bride
results.plot: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
results.stars: Rob Reiner, Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright, Chris Sarandon

results.title: Dead Poets Society
results.plot: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.
results.stars: Peter Weir, Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard, Ethan Hawke, Josh Charles

results.title: Airplane!
results.plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.
results.stars: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker, Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Leslie Nielsen, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

results.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
results.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Peter Coyote, Dee Wallace

results.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
results.plot: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.
results.stars: Irvin Kershner, Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams

results.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
results.plot: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.
results.stars: Richard Marquand, Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams

results.title: Ghostbusters
results.plot: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.
results.stars: Ivan Reitman, Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis

results.title: Amadeus
results.plot: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.
results.stars: Milos Forman, F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce, Elizabeth Berridge, Roy Dotrice

results.title: The Elephant Man
results.plot: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.
results.stars: David Lynch, Anthony Hopkins, John Hurt, Anne Bancroft, John Gielgud

results.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
results.plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.
results.stars: Robert Zemeckis, Bob Hoskins, Christopher Lloyd, Joanna Cassidy, Charles Fleischer

results.title: My Neighbor Totoro
results.plot: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.
results.stars: Hayao Miyazaki, Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto, Shigesato Itoi

results.title: Empire of the Sun
results.plot: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Christian Bale, John Malkovich, Miranda Richardson, Nigel Havers

results.title: Back to the Future Part II
results.plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.
results.stars: Robert Zemeckis, Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Tom Wilson

results.title: Cinema Paradiso
results.plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.
results.stars: Giuseppe Tornatore, Philippe Noiret, Enzo Cannavale, Antonella Attili, Isa Danieli

results.title: Glory
results.plot: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.
results.stars: Edward Zwick, Matthew Broderick, Denzel Washington, Cary Elwes, Morgan Freeman

results.title: Kiki's Delivery Service
results.plot: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.
results.stars: Hayao Miyazaki, Kirsten Dunst, Minami Takayama, Rei Sakuma, Kappei Yamaguchi

results.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
results.plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.
results.stars: Nicholas Meyer, William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, James Doohan

results.title: Gandhi
results.plot: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.
results.stars: Richard Attenborough, Ben Kingsley, John Gielgud, Rohini Hattangadi, Roshan Seth

results.title: The King of Comedy
results.plot: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.
results.stars: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Jerry Lewis, Diahnne Abbott, Sandra Bernhard

results.title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
results.plot: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.
results.stars: Hayao Miyazaki, Sumi Shimamoto, Mahito Tsujimura, Hisako Kyôda, Gorô Naya

results.title: Castle in the Sky
results.plot: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
results.stars: Hayao Miyazaki, Mayumi Tanaka, Keiko Yokozawa, Kotoe Hatsui, Minori Terada

results.title: The Right Stuff
results.plot: The U.S. space program's development from the breaking of the sound barrier to selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts, from a group of test pilots with a more seat-of-the-pants approach than the program's more cautious engineers preferred.
results.stars: Philip Kaufman, Sam Shepard, Scott Glenn, Ed Harris, Dennis Quaid

results.title: A Christmas Story
results.plot: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie Parker attempts to convince his parents, teacher, and Santa Claus that a Red Ryder Range 200 Shot BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.
results.stars: Bob Clark, Peter Billingsley, Melinda Dillon, Darren McGavin, Scott Schwartz

results.title: The Sacrifice
results.plot: At the dawn of World War III, a man searches for a way to restore peace to the world and finds he must give something in return.
results.stars: Andrei Tarkovsky, Erland Josephson, Susan Fleetwood, Allan Edwall, Guðrún Gísladóttir

results.title: Fitzcarraldo
results.plot: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.
results.stars: Werner Herzog, Klaus Kinski, Claudia Cardinale, José Lewgoy, Miguel Ángel Fuentes

results.title: Kagemusha
results.plot: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.
results.stars: Akira Kurosawa, Tatsuya Nakadai, Tsutomu Yamazaki, Ken'ichi Hagiwara, Jinpachi Nezu

results.title: Jean de Florette
results.plot: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.
results.stars: Claude Berri, Yves Montand, Gérard Depardieu, Daniel Auteuil, Elisabeth Depardieu

results.title: Goodbye, Children
results.plot: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. Occupying the next bed in the dormitory to the top student in his class, the two young boys begin to form a bond.
results.stars: Louis Malle, Gaspard Manesse, Raphael Fejtö, Francine Racette, Stanislas Carré de Malberg

results.title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
results.plot: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.
results.stars: Woody Allen, Mia Farrow, Jeff Daniels, Danny Aiello, Irving Metzman

results.title: Zelig
results.plot: "Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he's around, and meets various famous people.
results.stars: Woody Allen, Mia Farrow, Patrick Horgan, John Buckwalter
